describe.zh_CN: 要发展元素技术，一个好用的元素容器是一切的起点。有非常好的元素亲和性的元素水晶，便可以胜任这一职位，不过它的容量是有限的。\n元素水晶可以通过魔力水晶再次注魔得到，在元素活跃的时间段内，才可能注魔成功。\n注魔条件：日出日落的平原上
describe.en_US: To develop elemental technology, a reliable Element Container is the starting point. An Element Crystal with a strong affinity for elements can handle this role, although its capacity is limited.\nElement Crystals can be recharged using Magic Crystals, but only during active elemental periods.\nEnchanting Condition: On the plains during sunrise and sunset.
